co2api

Class TST

  • java.lang.Object
    • co2api.TST
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContractModel

    public class TST
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContractModel
    A TST is a contract model for Timed Session Types.
    Version:
    1.3.0
    Author:
    Sebastian Podda, Livio Pompianu

      • isCompliantWith

        public java.lang.Boolean isCompliantWith(TST other)
                                  throws ContractException
        Allows to check if this TST contract is compliant with another given TST.
        Parameters:
        other - The other TST
        Returns:
        True if the two contracts are compliant, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ContractException - In case of errors, for more informations check the exception message

      • dualOf

        public TST dualOf()
           throws ContractException
        Returns the dual of this TST or throws an exception if the contract does not admit a compliant.

        Throws:
